ygData.subject: Re: Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yup, a shaman friend and I stumbled on this spot around L10-12.  We *thought* we were fighting just one scarab.  We quickly had two, then three, with more
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Symber Ash wrote:
>
> And to the guy talking about the spawn rate....there was a place there (I
> don't do the /loc thing) that my group called the X-Roads. When your're
> near the road, you can rest...but go down the road a bit, and there were
> more Giant Scarabs and Spiders than you could hope to kill...I gained a lot
> of levels there...

Yup, a shaman friend and I stumbled on this spot around
L10-12. We *thought* we were fighting just one scarab. We
quickly had two, then three, with more coming to replace them
as quickly as we could kill them. In the end I think we ended
up killing 8 in succession without any rest in between, and
barely made it out with our lives.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
